amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal a District of Columbia law that prohibits residents from possessing a firearm.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 9 and printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to repeal the law that prohibits Washington, D.C. residents from owning firearms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goode amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 250, 2 Present (Roll no. 240).
